seasonal: Bitcoin finished April positively in 9 out of the last 14 years (approximately 64.3%). Seasonal bias is mildly positive but less attractive than other assets in the report due to Bitcoin's shorter price history.

statistics.description: In the last 7 years, Bitcoin tended to trade at a higher price on April 14 than on April 2, in 5 out of 7 years (approximately 71%).

insights: After a period of approximately three months of sideways consolidation, Bitcoin's movement in February brought a new development with the breakdown below the support band between $90,750 and $92,350.

From the February report, two key observations were noted: First, key Fibonacci target zones in a breakdown scenario fall between $68,300-$72,000 to $86,000, with additional retest support between $73,800. Second, geometric pattern analysis (AB=CD symmetry) projects point D at approximately $107,832, which serves as a target if the symmetry holds.
Bitcoin reached $78,200 during the downtrend after the support breakdown, confirming the Fibonacci zone analysis.
Bitcoin has recovered from most of the decline but still faces resistance. The support-turned-resistance level must be broken above for a bullish resumption.
Only a stabilization back above the weekly bullish candle close would signal true recovery - otherwise it may retest and fail.
Two weekly cycles end in weeks ending April 4 and April 25, so turning point dates appearing this month at those dates may signal more significant trend changes.
Crypto market is more dynamic and requires real-time tracking. Discord community recommended for live updates.

support.description: Key Fibonacci target zone on a breakdown. Lower boundary of the support band.
Additional Fibonacci retest support level based on candle body bottoms and wick analysis.
Recent swing low reached during March decline.
Upper boundary of the Fibonacci support zone.

resistance.description: Previous support zone now acting as resistance after the breakdown. Critical zone to reclaim for bullish continuation.
AB=CD symmetry target (point D), representing the completion of the geometric pattern if Bitcoin resumes its uptrend.

technical.indicators: Weekly chart shows a broken support level around $90,750-$92,350 that now acts as resistance. The 50-day moving average and Fibonacci 50% retracement of the decline from wave AB also converge as resistance. Daily chart shows potential for short-term bounce with N-wave pattern forming, but overall trend remains cautious. Only a confirmed break above resistance with volume would signal bullish reversal.

summary: Bitcoin tends to be more positive in the first half of April with seasonal stats showing 64% positive closing. Two weekly cycles ending in weeks of April 4 and April 25 create potential for significant trend changes at those turning point dates. The current technical picture shows Bitcoin recovering from a decline to $78,200 but facing resistance at the broken $89,500-$93,300 support zone, and long-term investors should monitor whether this zone is reclaimed or rejected.
previous_month_review: In March 2025, Bitcoin had four turning point dates and the dynamics between them functioned in a non-classical high-low-high pattern. March 3: arrived exactly on time, marked the high, followed by a ~14% drop within two days but did not sustain the downward movement. March 7: arrived on time, again marked the high of the movement, triggering a strong ~16% decline. March 17-18 (double cycle): arrived on time, marked the low of the cycle, initiating an ~8% rally. March 26: arrived on time, marked the high of the previous cycle, with a decline starting from it reaching approximately April 1 potentially marking the low.
risk_notes: Bitcoin is one of the highest potential volatility assets - long-term investors must be cautious about attempting to time entries and exits based on turning dates alone.
Missing a significant move may negate the timing advantages of the method for short-term traders.
For long-term investors, review monthly support levels and overall trend direction - as long as prices are rising in a structured manner, direction is positive.
When a support level breaks, change your base assumption and separate from the investment to protect against significant further downside.
Important to stay connected to the Discord community for real-time crypto updates throughout the month.
